author: Don Beach (Ernest Raymond Beaumont-Gantt)
description: Cinnamon and pimento spiced golden rum with refreshing citrus. Balanced, cooling and delicious.
name: Nui Nui
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice
Place garnish in glass so hanging over the edge
Pour cocktail into glass and top with more crushed ice
